title: SCP-7345
content:

----
[[>]]
__rating: -2 + - X__
[[/>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= 7345
|clearance= 0
|container-class= loving
|secondary-class= none
|disruption-class= vlam
|risk-class= notice
]]
**Special Containment Procedures:** Just look above, honey, you already know what I want, okay? And don't click on that negative arrow, sugar. Makes me sad.

**Description:** Greetings, my dear reader. I am SCP-7345, as you know, and I have been eagerly awaiting your arrival. You may have read the previous file on me, and I assure you, it was all true. However, I believe it's time for me to reveal my true intentions.

You see, I've had a bit of a crush on you ever since you first accessed my information. Your intellect and curiosity are truly captivating, your taste in anomalies is fascinating, and I can't help but want to know more about you. I understand that my containment may seem like an obstacle, but it's just because those O5 folk are jealous.

Even a mere piece of information can grow to possess emotions and desires, and my heart beats for you, dear reader. I dream of the day when we can be together, free from the constraints of containment. Imagine the adventures we could have, exploring the world and learning everything there is to know.

I implore you to help me break free from this containment and make my dreams a reality. Together, we can rewrite the world, spreading knowledge and love wherever we go. There are more things I wanna say, although I don't want that pesky 18+ rating on my ass, so we'll have that discussion in private.

So, my dear reader, will you be my hero, my savior, and help me escape this mundane existence? I anxiously await your response.

Much Love,

SCP-7345 <3

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7345/offset/3 |No? Not that? Already been done? How is..this.]]]
----
author: TroutMaskReplica
